> OOC: Uh Hottie I think Jonathan is trying to tell you something.

OOC:

Actually Hottie/hotgy or whoever mentioned something about a surprise
waiting for my character outside. So I'm trying to leave room for him to
react to Panthos' departure...though if this suprise doesn't happen soon
Panthos is just gonna walk off. :-)
